title: Create Commission Disbursement Authorization (CDA)
description: A transaction is closing tomorrow. The TC needs to create a CDA to send to the title company so the agent gets paid.

tasks.description: Verify the final sales price and commission percentage from the transaction file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the final price and commission structure.

tasks.description: Calculate the gross commission and subtract any brokerage fees or splits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the net commission payable to the agent and the brokerage.

tasks.description: Generate the CDA form and send it to the title company and the agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: A CDA document is created and distributed to all necessary parties.
